headline: PulteGroup (NYSE:PHM) Launches Del Webb Explore Communities For Gen X Resort-Style Living
summary: PulteGroup (NYSE:PHM) saw its shares rise by 1.6% over the past week, a performance that coincided with the company's launch of its new Del Webb Explore brand targeting Generation X's demand for resort-style living. This initiative may have invigorated investor sentiment by promising to capture additional market share in a lifestyle trend that could appeal to a demographic of approximately 63 million. Despite broader economic concerns indicated by a 0.2% decline in the Dow Jones and a 0.4%...

headline: PulteGroup Introduces Del Webb Explore – The Next Generation of Resort Living
summary: ATLANTA, March 03, 2025--Building upon Del Webb’s highly sought-after lifestyle communities for 55-plus homebuyers, PulteGroup Inc. (NYSE: PHM), one of the nation’s largest homebuilders, today introduced a new resort lifestyle-inspired brand targeting homebuyers of any generation: Del Webb Explore.
